message.content:
cs.DC, cs.NI, cs.SY, cs.PF, cs.LG. 

The paper deals with a job-assignment problem in a large-scale server farm system, which involves controlling the load on networked servers to maximize energy efficiency. This problem is relevant to several sub-fields of computer science, including distributed computing (cs.DC), computer networks (cs.NI), control systems (cs.SY), performance analysis (cs.PF), and machine learning (cs.LG). However, given that the focus of the paper is on developing a scalable, near-optimal policy for job assignment, and analyzing its performance guarantees using mathematical techniques, we believe that cs.DC and cs.NI are the most likely sub-categories. The other sub-categories are also relevant, but to a lesser extent.
